Translations.Text: Ya granthata mariyamacya vrttantacahi ullekha kara, jevha tyanni apalya kutumbacya lokampasuna vegale ho'una purvekade ekantavasa patkarala
Ani tya lokampasuna ada-padada kela, maga amhi ticyajavala apala atma (jibrila ale.) Pathavila, tara to ticyasamora sampurna manava rupata prakata jhala
Ti mhanali, mi tujhyapasuna rahamana (dayavana allaha) ce sarana magate, jara tu thodasahi allahace bhaya rakhanara ahesa
To mhanala, mi allahatarphe pathavila gelela rasula (presita) ahe, tula eka pavitra putra denyasathi alo ahe
Ti mhanali, mala putra kasa bare ho'u sakato? Mala tara ekhadya purusaca hata dekhila lagala nahi, ani na mi duracari ahe

To mhanala, pharmana tara heca ahe. (Parantu) tumacya palanakartyaca adesa ahe ki te majhyasathi pharaca sope ahe. Amhi tara tyala lokansathi eka nisani1 banavu ani apali khasa daya hi tara eka niscita asi gosta ahe
Maga ti garbhavati jhali ani yaca karanastava ti ekagracitta ho'una eka duracya thikani nighuna geli
Maga prasava-pida tila eka khajuricya jhadakhali ghe'una ali ani ticya tonduna nighale, arere! Mi yapurvi meli asati ani lokanna majha agadi visara padala asata
Tevadhyata tila utarakaduna haka aiku ali ki, nirasa ho'u nakosa, tujhya palanakartyane tujhya payakhali eka jhara pravahita kela ahe
Ani tya khajuricya jhadacya phandila apalyakade halava. Ti tujhyasamora tajya pikalelya khajuri padila
Ata nirdhasta ho'una kha ani pi ani dole thanda rakha, jara tula ekhada manusya disala tara sanga ki mi dayavana allahacya navane roja (upavasa) thevala ahe. Aja mi konatyahi manasasi bolanara nahi
Ata (hajarata isa) yanna ghe'una ti apalya lokammadhye ali. Sarvajana mhanale, mariyama, tu mothe va'ita krtya kelesa
He harunacya bahini! Na tara tujha pita va'ita manusa hota, ani na tujhi a'i duracari hoti
(Mariyamane) apalya balakade isara kela, sarva mhanu lagale, ata kusita asalelya balasi amhi bolanara tari kase
(Bala) udâ€Œgarale, mi sarvasrestha allahaca dasa ahe. Tyane mala grantha pradana kela ahe ani mala apala paigambara (duta) banavile ahe
Ani tyane mala subha mangaladayi banavile ahe, jithe dekhila mi rahina ani joparyanta mi jivanta rahina toparyanta tyane mala namaja ani jakataca adesa dila ahe
Ani tyane mala apalya mateca sevaka banavile ahe ani mala kathora ani durdaivi kele nahi
Ani majhyavara majhya janmacya divasi ani majhya mrtyucya divasi ani jya divasi mi dusaryanda ubha kela ja'ina, majhyavara santi-salamati ahe
Hi ahe sacci kahani mariyamaca putra isaci. Hica ti satya gostahoya, jyababata loka sansayata padale aheta
Allahakarita santati asane ucita nahi to tara atisaya pavitra ahe to jevha ekhadya kamaca sankalpa karato tevha tyasathi mhanato ho'una ja ani tya ksani te ghaduna yete
Ani majha ani tumha sarvanca palanakarta allahaca ahe. Tevha tumhi sarva tyacica upasana kara, haca sarala marga ahe
Maga (he) gata apasata matabheda karu lagale. Tathapi kaphiransathi duhkha ahe eka bhayankara divasacya yenyane
Kiti cangale pahanare aikanare asatila tya divasi, jevha amacyasamora hajara hotila, parantu aja tara he atyacari loka ughada asa margabhrastateta padale aheta
Ani tumhi tyanna ya duhkha ani nirasecya divasace bhaya aikava jevha karya purnatvasa pohacavile ja'ila ani he loka gaphalatita ani be'imanitaca paduna rahatila
Nihsansaya, dharatice ani dharativara rahanaryance varasa amhica asanara ani samasta loka amacyacakade paratavuna anale jatila
